CodeSystem: medication-dose-unit

medication-dose-unit

The list of most commonly used units of measure for a medication dose. Suggestions for additions are accepted.

This code system http://www.fhir.org/guides/mfhir/CodeSystem/medication-dose-unit defines the following codes:
